divs: Sighting DetailsToday,while driving to my mom's house.I saw this metallic object on my right,above a pineapple field,in the county of Sabana Hoyos.I slowed down a bit-out of my curiosity-and I thought I saw an airplane traveling toward's San Juan.A couple of street's down,a horde of people were parked on the side of the road,standing out in the open field,and I knew they were seeing the same thing.I picked my space and went toward's them. There it was.A cigar shaped "something" hovering at about 200 ft. from the ground.This shiny object had clear visible window's,it had an aprox. length of maybe 30 or 40 ft.-maybe more-and it's nose,or rather one of it's end's was tilted as if it was looking down-depending on the perspective. The sighting lasted roughly 10 to 12 mins. and then that thing was gone.I mean it vanished like a ghost.Some eye witnesses had cameras and cell phone's calling and capturing it on them.Not me.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Barceloneta
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I was surprised to see one,not to mention the weather was perfect,not a cloud nearby.
